name: Resolution on Nanotechnology, the Rights of Machines, and Life I guess
name_original: Resolution on Nanotechnology, the Rights of Machines, and Life I guess
description:
The cyber-written manifesto of the disgruntled UN-regional-coordinator-turned-nanotech-supervillain, "General Assembly," whose ultimate goal is a kinder, gentler Africa made of only perfect nanites.  A rambling mess of genocide(al) reflections, numbers & figures, and personal derangements.  Mouse wheel forward to examine things further, mouse wheel backward to recoil.  Safari!

Inspired by Marvel, Kanye West's "Power", Kanye West's bipolar disorder, and every autocracy-bureaucracy combo ever mashed into the numerous fight sticks connected to the African game console.

Must be run full screen.

Words + program by @lynchpoet
